summary: Gives Red Eagle's Bane/Fury a makeover, changing both to Daedric Swords. Also removes the old effects, replacing them with Absorb Health, and extra damage to Nords and Imperials.
descriptionHtml:
I was always a little disappointed with the vanilla versions of Red Eagle's sword. It seemed strange to me that it would be an Ancient Nord Sword for starters, given that the Nords and Imperials are the Reachmen's enemies. So I changed it to a Daedric Sword, which feels more like something the Old Gods of the Reach would bestow upon their champion.

As a Daedric Sword, it is now tempered with an ebony ingot, and requires the Daedric Smithing perk to get the full effect of tempering.

I also changed the effects. The base sword now has an Absorb Health of 5 points, and the Upgraded version an Absorb Health of 10 points. The Upgraded sword has also been renamed Red Eagle's Vengeance, and does an extra 1.5 times base damage to Nords and Imperials - the oppressors of the Reachmen. This includes Nordic and Imperial vampires.

I have also included an optional 2 Handed Sword version of the mod. Note that this will not work with the normal - one handed - version of this mod. Only select one or the other, based on whether you want a one or two handed sword.

Version History:
1.0 -
Original Release

1.1 -
Increased the number of charges the swords have.
author: SubRosa_Florens
